"Royalty?" Inferno questioned landing nearby.

"You don't gotta tell me twice, I'm outta here" Quickstrike said and
begun to run back to the base.

At the predicon base Waspinator's head had finnaly bounced it's way
all the way there. "Waspinator always get stuck getting blown to scrap!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Hydras --
> 
> Megatron's side of the Hydras yells out with increasing 
> intensity, "Hydras TERRORIZE," and the bot transforms.
> 
> Hydras raises his voice and calls out to the predacons, "PREDACONS, 
> I am Hydras... Megatron and Galvatron are no more, and any who see 
> fit to question my power are welcome to be crushed by my hand."
> 
> "NOW, return to base, we have more important thing to do that 
> continue this battle." He pauses to allow his words to sink in. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> >  "It shall be done that way.  I feel we should call our troops to 
> retreat 
> > back your troops so we can explain what has happened and unify 
> ourselves. 
> > Hydras is a name fate has put in our spark. It is how it was meant 
> to be." 
> > His head bobbed up and down.
